info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 2:49PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Prowers, southeastern Kiowa and eastern Bent Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 247 PM MDT, scattered thunderstorms continue developing northeastward across Prowers and eastern Bent Counties. Movement of this activity is northeast around 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar and satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Granada, Wiley, Hartman, Neeoshe Reservoir, Bristol, Neegronda Reservoir and Queens Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts may occur well away from precipitation or lightning.
